scripts.init:author: tsx src/scripts/initAuthor.ts
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build
scripts.dev:clean: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Set-Location -LiteralPath 'c:\Users\Noteb\lernarena neuste'; $ports=@(3000,3001); foreach($port in $ports){ $procId=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty OwningProcess); if($procId){ try{ Stop-Process -Id $procId -Force -ErrorAction Stop }catch{} } }; if (Test-Path '.next'){ try{ Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '.next' }catch{} }; npm run dev"
